task_1_feedback.product_name: Expected: High-Performance Laptop, Found: Industrial-Grade Safety Gloves
task_1_feedback.dimensions: Expected: 35.8x24.6x1.8 cm, Found: Length: 12 inches, Width: 4 inches (adjustable wrist strap)
task_1_feedback.materials: Expected: Aluminum, Plastic, Found: Nitrile-coated polyester, reinforced fingertips, breathable fabric
task_1_feedback.performance_criteria: Expected: Intel i7 processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 15.6-inch display, Found: Must meet ANSI/ISEA 105-2016 Cut Level A4, puncture resistance of 50 Newtons, chemical resistance to common industrial solvents
task_1_feedback.additional_requirements: Expected: Must include a backlit keyboard, Wi-Fi 6 support, and a minimum battery life of 10 hours., Found: Must be ambidextrous, have textured grip pattern, and include conductive fingertips for touchscreen compatibility. Packaging must include individual polybags with lot numbering for traceability.

task_2_feedback.issue_description: Expected: The dimensions are missing units., Found: Material specification lists 'high-quality steel' without defining alloy composition or hardness requirements
task_2_feedback.suggested_correction: Expected: Add 'cm' to the dimensions to specify the units., Found: Specify exact alloy grade (e.g., AISI 304 stainless steel) and Rockwell hardness range (e.g., HRC 45-50)

task_2_feedback.issue_description: Expected: The material list is incomplete., Found: Dimensional tolerances are missing for critical components
task_2_feedback.suggested_correction: Expected: Include all materials such as 'Aluminum, Plastic, Glass'., Found: Add ±0.5mm tolerance for all machined surfaces and ±1° for angular measurements

task_2_feedback.issue_description: Expected: Performance criteria lack specific processor model., Found: Performance testing section references outdated standard (ASTM F1234-2010)
task_2_feedback.suggested_correction: Expected: Specify the processor model, e.g., 'Intel i7-1165G7'., Found: Update to current ASTM F1234-2023 standard and specify required testing laboratory accreditation

task_2_feedback.issue_description: Expected: Additional requirements do not mention operating system compatibility., Found: Packaging requirements omit important details about moisture protection
task_2_feedback.suggested_correction: Expected: Add 'Must be compatible with Windows 10 and Linux'., Found: Add requirement for vacuum-sealed packaging with desiccant packets for moisture-sensitive components
